name: Verge (XPS)
description:
A small 3D platformer in which you have to go through about 12 levels.

The game is as simple as possible in terms of implementation, but the subtext that it carries in itself is not as simple as it seems...

Each person who has played "Verge" will perceive it differently.

And how will you understand it?

This is my 2nd Godot project.

I hope you will like it.

Have a nice game.
